name: gaia online dark theme and midnight black dark
description:
this will make gaia dark, main color will be black however grey, dark blue and some green to make text stand out better 
providing this one because the one dark theme is no longer supported and others are not happy with the dark blue theme. this addresses both of those issues and gives you another option for dark theme 
WILL WORK for gaia upgrade 
WILL WORK by itself with no programs added on
WILL WORK with other scripts turned on 

WILL NOT WORK for better gaia

UPDATE: NO LONGER A GLOBAL SCRIPT PLEASE UPDATE OR REINSTALL!!!
additional_info:
some of my other scripts may need to be turned off if you use this one, however it combines many of the fixes in other ones like clan fixes and guild fixes so it may be worth turning them off 
as always feedback at my email of juangarcia9930@gmail.com is always welcome. just label it problems or feedback with your dark theme so i know where to look for any problems 

october 2016 updates:

created on 10/31 - code went live 
update on 10/31 - about 12 hours later...
about 20 lines of code were removed as they interfered with the aquarium page. now fixed

november 2016 updates:

11/1 PLEASE UPDATE about 200 new lines of code were added to make the dark theme better overall so please update it if you downloaded it
11/2 about 8 more lines of code added as you could not see forum stamps, now fixed
11/4 intergrated about 13 new lines of code into this script because of what gaia did with the rina thing . so the pink doesn't stand out so bad
11/5 found a problem that only shows up in opera browser, this has now been fixed.

december 2016 updates:

12/13 minor bug fixes for firefox and also some coding updates. suggested content should also now be dark if you have that showing

12/15 fixed profile tab button on the my gaia page and reverted guild buttons back to blue. they highlight as grey now. i have had requests to know which button or tab users have hovered over in guilds. this should take care of that. minor bug fixes too. if you dont like the guild navbar revert then you can change it back to grey, check on lines 297 - 304 to change the color for the guild and arenas navbar

1/15/2017 lots of bug fixes and removal of global effect on all websites fixed

1/16/2017 minor adjustments for opera browser only

1/19/2017 changes for the guilds to have more darkness to look more like the main forums

1/26/17 recent changes on the site caused this code to break the forums in guilds, this has now been fixed also it highlights parts of the bold / underline / align / etc in boxes so i know if it breaks again

2/28 minor adjustments to code so it continues to work

6/24/17 minor bug fix to work with another gaia script

2019 fixes
this code was re adjusted on 11/19/2019 as an alternate to what gaia proposed

11/20
2 lines of extra code to make guilds work right and added a new color to fix header

2020
updated on 05/29/2020 due to recent changes on gaias site additional lines of code were needed

5/31 code optimized for speed
